purpose: Feedback on the drag-and-drop email editor and templates
text: set the channel description: Feedback on the drag-and-drop email editor and templates

Welcome everyone! Happy to answer any questions about the drag-and-drop email editor, help with any bugs, etc. Myself and the team are based in Ireland :flag-ie: so aren't in sync with most of your timezones but we'll make an effort to reply as quickly as possible :slightly_smiling_face:
not an important question at all, but under the hood are you guys using zurb foundation for emails?
